summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Gemma model's functionality, covering configuration, sequence classification (single and multi‑label), various embedding handling, cache formats, attention mechanisms (flash attention 2 and SDPA), generation behavior, and model serialization.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and compatibility of the Gemma model for production use by detecting regressions and confirming that optimizations and different execution paths work as intended.
